title: Macbook Air A1466
message: Customer told me never was droped. Problem is sometimes randomly it crashs with kernel error and reboot. Somebody repaired Macbook air with this problem?

title: Macbook Air A1466
message:
i would check for any liquid damage. i repaired a macbook air last week, never dropped or had any liquid spill. but when i open the back cover. i found two test points was corroded which are on the edge next to the air vent.
these air vents are really shit, they suck up anything.

title: Macbook Air A1466
message: If there is no corrosion then forget about this one. I assume you ruled out bad OSX and/or SSD.

title: Macbook Air A1466
message: No corrosion. I tried with another ssd. With Maverick it works ok. Just sometimes reboot. With EL Sierra no way. Doesnot even load the OS X. Never see that before?

title: Macbook Air A1466
message: Yes it was RAM. I replaced ram and now it works ok. But now I have another problem with same board. 1 day it works ok with sound and today no sound. I tried with another speakers and no sound.

title: Macbook Air A1466
message: Sound is all on the IO board. Try known good IO board and flat cable.
